title: Financial Instrument System Data Contracts
description: Defines the formal JSON schemas for the structured input prompt to the Autonomous Financial Engineering Cognizance Engine (AFECE) and the detailed financial instrument output.

AFECE_StructuredPromptSchema.title: AFECE Structured Prompt Input
AFECE_StructuredPromptSchema.description: Schema for the structured prompt sent to the Autonomous Financial Engineering Cognizance Engine (AFECE), translating user desiderata into actionable instructions.

role.description: The designated role for the AI model within the financial engineering context.

task.description: The specific task the AI model is instructed to perform for financial instrument design.

constraints.description: A collection of hard constraints that the generated financial instrument must satisfy.

principal_protection_level.description: Desired capital preservation at maturity, expressed as a fraction (0.0 to 1.0, where 1.0 is 100%).

market_exposure_indices.description: List of identifiers for underlying assets or indices to which the instrument should have exposure.

investment_term_years.description: The target duration of the investment in full years.

max_annual_volatility.description: Maximum permissible annualized volatility, expressed as a fraction (e.g., 0.08 for 8%).

esg_alignment_score_min.description: Minimum Environmental, Social, Governance (ESG) alignment score for underlying assets (0.0 to 1.0).

objectives.description: A collection of objectives that the AFECE should optimize for when designing the instrument.

target_annual_yield.description: Desired range for the annualized yield.

min.description: Minimum target annual yield as a fraction.

max.description: Maximum target annual yield as a fraction.

upside_participation_preference.description: User's preference for participating in upside market movements.

downside_risk_mitigation.description: User's preference for mitigating downside risk.

response_schema_id.description: Identifier for the expected JSON schema that the AFECE should adhere to for its output.

reasoning_directive.description: Specific instructions for the AFECE regarding its reasoning process and how to structure its explanation of design choices.

AFECE_InstrumentOutputSchema.title: AFECE Instrument Output Structure
AFECE_InstrumentOutputSchema.description: Schema for the detailed structured data object representing a proposed financial instrument, generated by the AFECE.

instrumentName.description: A unique, descriptive name for the generated financial instrument.

instrumentType.description: Categorization of the financial instrument (e.g., Structured Note, Equity-Linked Note).

assetIdentifier.description: Ticker symbol, ISIN, or index name for the underlying asset.

assetType.description: Type of the underlying asset (e.g., Equity, Index, Bond, Commodity, FX, Credit, InterestRate).

weighting.description: Proportional weighting within a basket of assets, if applicable.

underlyingAssets.description: A list of primary underlying assets or indices that the instrument is linked to.

componentType.description: Type of the financial primitive component (e.g., ZeroCouponBond, CallOption, PutOption, SwapLeg).

underlying.description: Identifier of the specific underlying asset for this particular component.

strikePrice.description: Applicable for options or forwards, representing the exercise price.

maturityDate.description: Maturity or expiry date of the component in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

notionalAmount.description: Notional value or principal allocation for this component.

parameters.description: Component-specific parameters (e.g., participation rate, coupon rate, barrier levels, reset frequency, leverage factor).

components.description: Detailed breakdown of the financial primitives constituting the instrument.

principalProtection.description: Guaranteed principal return percentage at maturity (0-100).

payoffFormula.description: Mathematical expression defining the instrument's payoff at maturity or during its life. E.g., `Notional * (1 + Max(0, ParticipationRate * (SPX_Final / SPX_Initial - 1))) + ZeroCouponBondYield`.

issueDate.description: The date the instrument is issued in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

maturityDate.description: The date the instrument matures in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

denomination.description: The currency in which the instrument is denominated (e.g., USD, EUR).

minSubscriptionAmount.description: The minimum investment amount required for the instrument.

listingExchange.description: The exchange where the instrument is listed, if applicable.

issuer.description: Placeholder for the hypothetical issuer entity of the instrument.

summary.description: A concise, plain-language description of the instrument's features and benefits.

riskFactors.description: A list of identified risks associated with the instrument.

expectedReturnAnnualized.description: The expected annualized return of the instrument based on simulations.

volatilityAnnualized.description: The simulated annualized volatility of the instrument.

maxDrawdownSimulated.description: The maximum simulated drawdown from a peak value.

probabilityOfPrincipalLoss.description: The simulated probability of experiencing a loss of principal (0.0 to 1.0).

sharpeRatioSimulated.description: The simulated Sharpe Ratio, measuring risk-adjusted return.

simulationResults.description: Placeholder for metrics generated by the Instrument Validation and Simulation System (IVSS).

regulatoryCompliance.description: Identified regulatory categories or specific compliance notes (e.g., MiFID II, Dodd-Frank, PRIIPs).
